mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FREE_BOARD (bno, title, content, writer) VALUES (seq_free_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_FREE_BOARD SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate WHERE bno = #{bno}
